mission: IQ Leading Center is committed to providing high-quality education and personalized guidance to learners of all levels. We aim to foster a supportive learning environment, cultivate curiosity, critical thinking, and innovation, and equip students with the skills and confidence needed to succeed in their academic and professional journeys.
vision: To become a leading center of excellence in education, empowering students with knowledge, critical thinking, and life skills to excel academically and professionally.
